蕑字的基本解释

蕑
jiān
同“蕳”。

蕑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《廣韻》古閑切，平山，見。］
亦作“蕳1”。
(1)兰草的一种。
(2)通“菅”。草名。参见“蕑屨”。
(3)宽大；大。
(4)姓。汉有蕑忌。见《史记·淮南衡山列传》。

蕑字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蕑； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1057第35
【唐韻】古閑切，音閒。【詩·鄭風】士與女方秉蕑兮。【傳】蕑，蘭也。【爾雅翼】蕑草，大都似澤蘭。【盛弘之·荆州記】都梁縣有山，山下有水淸泚，其中生蘭草，名都梁香，因山爲號。其物可殺蟲，毒除不祥。故鄭人方春三月，于溱洧之上，士女相與秉蕑而祓除。　又【韻會】《韓詩》傳，蓮也。　又【齊民要術】蕑子藤生緣樹，實如梨，赤如雞冠，核如魚鱗，取生食之。　又姓。【史記·淮南厲王傳】中尉蕑忌。【索隱】蕑，姓也。【漢書·師古註】姓蕑名忌。本此蕑字。或作?，非。　又【集韻】何閒切，音閑。草名。

蕑字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蕑字的起名意思

暂无。

Stalk
Basic explanation of words
Stalk
jiān
Same as "蕳".
Stalk
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Guangyun" Ancient Xianqie, Hirayama, see you. ]
Also known as "蕳1".
(1) A kind of bluegrass.
(2) Through "Suga". Cursive name. See "Wingy".
(3) Leniency; big.
(4) Last name. Han has a taboo. See "Historical Biography of Huainan Hengshan".
Stalk
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Kezi] 　蕑; Kangxi strokes: 18; page number: page 1057 to 35
[Tang Yun] Ancient Xian cut, sound Xian. 【Poetry·Zheng Feng】The scholar and the woman are Bing Weixi. [Biography] Wei, Lan Ye. 【Erya Wing】Small grass, mostly like Eupatorium. [Sheng Hongzhi·Jingzhou] Duliang County has mountains, underneath there are shuizhulu, among them, blue grass grows, the name is Liangxiang, and the name is because of the mountain. It can kill insects, poison and eliminate ominous. Therefore, Zheng Fangchun in March, above Qin Bian, the scholar and the female minister and Bing Wei were eliminated.　[Yunhui] "Han Shi" Biography, Lian Ye.　[Qi Min Yao Shu] Pingzi vine grows a marginal tree, which is like a pear, red like a cockscomb, and a core like a fish scale. It is eaten raw.　Another last name. [Historical Records · Huainan Li Wang Biography] Lieutenant Wei Ji. 【Suoyin】Feng, the last name is also. [Hanshu·Shigu Note] Surnames and names are taboos. This is the word. Or for?, no.　[Jiyun] He Xian cut, sound Xian. Cursive name.
